content.title: Old Age Pension Scheme (APB&OCWWB)
content.details: The scheme 'Old Age Pension Scheme' was started by the Department of Labour and Employment, Govt. of Arunachal Pradesh for registered workers of Arunachal Pradesh Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (APB&OCWWB). The government of Arunachal Pradesh has introduced the pension scheme through the board and the aim of the scheme is to secure the economic dependency of a worker after retirement or at an old age period.
benefits: Cash assistance of ₹500/- per month, to the old age beneficiaries with an increase in ₹10/- on completion of every 5 years.
eligibility: The applicant should be a permanent resident of Arunachal Pradesh.
The applicant must be employed in the Building and Other Construction works.
The applicant should be registered with Labour Welfare Board (APB&OCWWB).
The applicant with a membership for at least 1 year after the age of 60 years is eligible to apply under the scheme.
content.application_process: Offline. Step 01: For taking benefit of this scheme, the applicant needs to contact Registering Officers, APB&OCWWB of the respective District. Step 02: Application in the prescribed format may be received from the concerned office. Step 03: The applicant needs to fill the application form completely and attach all the relevant documents. Thereafter, the applicant may submit the application form to the concerned office. Step 04: After successful verification, the applicant can avail the benefit of the scheme.
documents_required: Identity proof i.e. Aadhaar Card, Voter ID card, etc.
Xerox copy of the registration card of the worker
Bank Account details/ front page of the passbook

faqs.question: What is the aim of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The aim of this scheme is to secure the economic dependency of a worker after retirement or at an old age period.

faqs.question: By which department was this scheme launched?
faqs.answer: Department of Labour and Employment, Government of Arunachal Pradesh.

faqs.question: What is the full form of APB&OCWWB?
faqs.answer: Arunachal Pradesh Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board.

faqs.question: What is the amount of pension to be given to the eligible worker?
faqs.answer: A monthly pension of ₹500/- will be given to old-age beneficiaries.

faqs.question: What should be the minimum age to take the benefit of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The minimum age of the applicant should be 60 years.

faqs.question: How much will be the increment in pension?
faqs.answer: The pension will increase by ₹10/- on completion every 5 years.

faqs.question: Is it mandatory to be registered under Board for a worker?
faqs.answer: Yes, the labour/worker must be a registered worker under the Board.

faqs.question: Who is eligible under this scheme?
faqs.answer: A registered worker with a membership for at least 1 year after the age of 60 years is eligible for the scheme.

faqs.question: Is this scheme only for a worker/labour of Arunachal Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Yes, the applicant should be a permanent resident of Arunachal Pradesh.

faqs.question: How can I avail the benefits of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The applicant needs to contact Registering Officers, APB&OCWWB of the respective District.
